summary: I HAD THE PASSENGER SIDE TIRE ON THE CAMPER DELAMINATE WHILE GOING ABOUT 75MPH (THE SPEED LIMIT) WITH RESULTING SHAKING, THE LEAF SPRING BROKE AND AXLE BENT. THE ENTIRE CAMPER SEPARATED FROM THE FRAME AND FLEW IN THE AIR AND LANDED ABOUT 100 FEET FROM THE FRAME. THE CAMPER WAS SECURED WITH MULTIPLE SCREWS, ALL OF WHICH CAME LOOSE EXCEPT ONE THAT BROKE. THE PICTURE OF THE CAMPER AND FRAME ARE AFTER BEING TOWED TO WRECKING YARD.
